row.process:
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Remote Host Address " : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AIOPS_REMOTE_HOST_ADDR#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Maximum Hops " : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AIOPS_MAX_HOPS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Resolve Address " : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AIOPS_RESOLVE_ADDR#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Reply Timeout " : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AIOPS_REPLY_TIMEOUT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "IP Version " : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AIOPS_IP_VERSION#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Advanced Options " : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AIOPS_ADVANCED_OPTIONS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Connection Tool " : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AIOPS_TOOLS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
